00014 {

00019 /*
00020  *
00021  *
00022  */
00023 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00024 {
00025     struct Device *hd;
00026     struct Volume *vol;
00027     struct List *list, *cell;
00028     struct GenBlock *block;
00029     BOOL true = TRUE;
00030     struct File *file;
00031     unsigned char buf[600];
00032     long n;
00033     FILE *out;
00034     long len;
00035   
00036     adfEnvInitDefault();
00037 
00038     adfChgEnvProp(PR_USEDIRC,&true);
00039  
00040     hd = adfMountDev(argv[1], FALSE);
00041     if (!hd) {
00042         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount device\n");
00043         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00044     }
00045 
00046     adfDeviceInfo(hd);
00047 
00048     vol = adfMount(hd, 0, FALSE);
00049     if (!vol) {
00050         adfUnMountDev(hd);
00051         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount volume\n");
00052         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00053     }
00054 
00055     cell = list = adfGetDirEnt(vol, vol->curDirPtr);
00056     while(cell) {
00057         printEntry(cell->content);
00058         cell = cell->next;
00059     }
00060     adfFreeDirList(list);
00061     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00062 
00063     puts("\nremove MOON.GIF");
00064     adfRemoveEntry(vol,vol->curDirPtr,"MOON.GIF");
00065     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00066 
00067     cell = list = adfGetDelEnt(vol);
00068     while(cell) {
00069         block =(struct GenBlock*) cell->content;
00070        printf("%s %d %d %ld\n",block->name,block->type,block->secType,
00071             block->sect);
00072         cell = cell->next;
00073     }
00074     adfFreeDelList(list);
00075 
00076     adfCheckEntry(vol,884,0);
00077     adfUndelEntry(vol,vol->curDirPtr,884);
00078     puts("\nundel MOON.GIF");
00079     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00080 
00081     cell = list = adfGetDirEnt(vol, vol->curDirPtr);
00082     while(cell) {
00083         printEntry(cell->content);
00084         cell = cell->next;
00085     }
00086     adfFreeDirList(list);
00087 
00088     file = adfOpenFile(vol, "MOON.GIF","r");
00089     if (!file) return 1;
00090     out = fopen("moon_gif","wb");
00091     if (!out) return 1;
00092 
00093     len = 600;
00094     n = adfReadFile(file, len, buf);
00095     while(!adfEndOfFile(file)) {
00096         fwrite(buf,sizeof(unsigned char),n,out);
00097         n = adfReadFile(file, len, buf);
00098     }
00099     if (n>0)
00100         fwrite(buf,sizeof(unsigned char),n,out);
00101 
00102     fclose(out);
00103 
00104     adfCloseFile(file);
00105 
00106     adfUnMount(vol);
00107     adfUnMountDev(hd);
00108 
00109     adfEnvCleanUp();
00110 
00111     return 0;
00112 }
